project_abstract.cdata: The Tarim Basin Project will alleviate poverty in several of the poorest counties with a predominant minority population in Xinjiang Region by increasing crop and livestock production and productivity.  The project will: (i) rehabilitate and upgrade irrigation and drainage facilities in Yerqiang and Weigan oases through construction of canal lining, drainage canals, diversion structures, tubewells and onfarm works for low yielding land and reclaimed areas of desert wasteland; (ii) construct a small hydro-power station on the Yerqiang River and inter-connecting transmission grid to expand the electrical generating and transmission capacities; (iii) finance the improvement and expansion of the agricultural extension system at county and township levels; seed processing, distribution and multiplication systems; farm mechanization centers; hail suppression system, and research in cotton; (iv) finance the expansion of livestock services in breed improvement, veterinary and feed development services, improved research and training and development of mixed crop/livestock farms; and (v) finance an ecosystem restoration component designed to recover some of the natural forest along the Tarim River which boarders the Taklimakan desert to prevent expansion of the desert.

P003556.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>塔里木盆地项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将通过增加农作物和畜牧生产及提高生产率缓解新疆自治区几个最贫困县的贫困程度。项目将：（1）在沙漠地区湿地的低洼地和开垦地区开展渠道衬砌，修建排水渠、引水建筑物、机井和田间工程，恢复并升级叶尔羌绿洲和渭干绿洲的灌溉排水设施；（2）在叶尔羌河上修建一座小型水电站，同时新建输电网，以增加发电和输电能力；（3）资助改造和扩建县乡（镇）农技推广系统、种子加工、销售和繁殖系统、农业机械厂中心、防雹系统以及棉花研究；（4）资助扩大畜牧品种改良服务、兽医服务和饲料开发服务以及农牧场培训和研发服务；（5）资助生态系统恢复子项目，其宗旨是恢复塔里木河（地处塔克拉玛干沙漠边缘）沿岸天然林，防止沙漠进一步扩大。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
